matcher.potionicons.effect.title: Effect Icon
matcher.potionicons.potion.title: Potion
text.autoconfig.potionicons.option.cycle: Seconds between rotation for potions with multiple effects when not holding shift.
Seconds between rotation for potions with multiple effects when holding shift.
text.autoconfig.potionicons.option.norma: If the effect icons are rendered in front of or behind the item when not holding shift.
How effect icons are rendered over items when not holding shift:
TRY_BOTTOM_RIGHT: Renders in the bottom right corner for non-stackable items. Top left otherwise.
TOP_LEFT: Renders in the top left corner.
FULL: Renders across the entire item slot.
text.autoconfig.potionicons.option.shift: If the effect icons are rendered in front of or behind the item when holding shift.
How effect icons are rendered over items when holding shift:
TRY_BOTTOM_RIGHT: Renders in the bottom right corner for non-stackable items. Top left otherwise.
TOP_LEFT: Renders in the top left corner.
FULL: Renders across the entire item slot.
